fields.name: scheduledPublishTime
fields.comment: Timestamp in sec. Empty means in draft or unpublished.

fields.name: publishedTime
fields.comment: Timestamp in sec. Empty means not published yet but may be pending published.

fields.name: errorMessages
fields.comment: Any problem during publishing process. E.g. failed to encode the video, or failed to make a payment.

fields.name: publishedTime
fields.comment: Timestamp in sec. Empty means not published yet but may be pending published.

fields.name: showHasError
fields.comment: Show a message that there are errors the user should check.
